title: みんなの人気者の後に・ド根性！

text.jpText:
中々勝つことが出来ないハルウララ。
だが、世間では『負けても負けても
頑張っているウマ娘』と話題になりはじめる。
text.enText:
Haruurara is not able to win often. However, 
the world begins to talk about her as "the 
horsegirl who works hard even though she 
loses and loses. However, the public begins 
to talk about "horsegirl who is doing her 
best even though she loses and loses.

text.jpText:
そんな中、『後援会』に入ったファンたちと
交流し、ハルウララのモチベーションは
更に上向いていく。
text.enText:
Haruwurara's motivation is further boosted by 
her interactions with fans who have joined 
the "Supporters' Association. Haru Urara's 
motivation is further improved.

text.jpText:
やる気に燃える彼女を見て、トレーナーは
目標とするレースを見つけてもらい、そこで
1着を取らせてあげたいと強く思うのだった。
text.enText:
Seeing her motivated, the trainer was 
determined to help her find her target race 
and get her to finish first in it. her 
trainer to find her target race and let her 
win first place in it.
